text: Linda F. Collins-Smith (December 31, 1961 â€“ June 4, 2019) was an American businesswoman and politician. She was a Republican member of the Arkansas Senate from 2015 through 2019 and before was a member of the Arkansas House of Representatives from 2011 to 2013. She was born in Pocahontas, Arkansas. ==Assassination== On June 4, 2019, a decomposing body was found in a blanket outside Collins-Smith's home in Pocahontas, with stab wounds. On June 6, police announced the body was Collins-Smith. They did not confirm a cause of death. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1961 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths by firearm in the United States Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Businesspeople from Arkansas Category:Politicians from Arkansas Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Linda Collins-Smith
